nodes.text: Dahal was a low-scale criminal living on Nar Shaddaa during the Yuuzhan Vong War. In 25 ABY he approached a group of young Jedi trainees, trying to "show them the vertical city", and stole Jacen Solo's credit pouch. Later, he was confronted by Solo and Lowbacca and followed by Finn Galfridian during their search for the information regarding Yuuzhan Vong agents.
Dahal was later seen in the company of Spraug and Dray. Dray sensed that Finn Galfridian was returning to Nar Shaddaa, and had Dahal and Spraug buy him new clothes.
